parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description:
The streaming domain or ingest domain.

You can specify only one domain name.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The end of the time range to query data. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

The end time must be later than the start time. The maximum time range that can be specified is 31 days.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values:

*   Valid values: integers from **1 to 1000**.
*   Default value: **300**.
*   Maximum value: **1000**.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.
